data.name: Valley Knights OST
data.detailed_description: This soundtrack features 16 tracks custom-made for Valley Knights for all aspects of the game.  From the main menu to the final boss, every beat of this soundscape is driven by an 80s-esque, darkwave mix of modern post-apocalyptic beats and retro synth.
data.about_the_game: This soundtrack features 16 tracks custom-made for Valley Knights for all aspects of the game.  From the main menu to the final boss, every beat of this soundscape is driven by an 80s-esque, darkwave mix of modern post-apocalyptic beats and retro synth.
data.short_description: The Visitor sets the Valley Knights soundscape ablaze with a blend of post-apocalyptic darkwave and modern retrowave. From soothing ambient sounds to grinding boss-beats, this soundtrack has it all.
data.legal_notice: © Long Road Games. All rights reserved.

subs.option_text: Valley Knights OST by The Visitor - 21₴
